extensionAttribute.description: Results are: Restricted Editing Enabled Restricted Editing Disabled Restricted Editing Unknown
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
vmname="Fedora (DC) 15.06.0" USER=`who | grep console | awk '{print $1}'`
result=$(sudo -u $USER prlctl list "$vmname" -i | grep -i Edit | awk '{print $3}')
if [ "$result" == "yes" ]; then result="Restricted Editing Enabled" elif [ "$result" == "no" ]; then result="Restricted Editing Disabled" else result="Restricted Editing Unknown" fi
echo "<result>result</result>"
